commit.message:
Rollup merge of #47543 - topecongiro:issue-42344, r=nikomatsakis

Disallow mutable borrow to non-mut statics

Closes #42344.

+static TAB: [&mut [u8]; 0] = [];
+
+pub unsafe fn test() {
+    TAB[0].iter_mut(); //~ ERROR cannot borrow data mutably in a `&` reference [E0389]
+}
+
+pub fn main() {}
